mutants.code:
def calculate_partition_cost(n, a):
    MOD = 998244354

    def ncr(n, r, p):
        num = den = 1
        for i in range(r):
            num = num * (n - i) % p
            den = den * (i + 1) % p
        return num * pow(den, p - 2, p) % p
    a.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans += abs(a[i] - a[2 * n - 1 - i])
    fac = ncr(2 * n, n, MOD)
    return fac * ans % MOD

def calculate_partition_cost(n, a):
    MOD = 998244353

    def ncr(n, r, p):
        num = den = 1
        for i in range(r):
            num = num * (n - i) % p
            den = den * (i + 1) % p
        return (num + pow(den, p - 2, p)) % p
    a.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans += abs(a[i] - a[2 * n - 1 - i])
    fac = ncr(2 * n, n, MOD)
    return fac * ans % MOD
